Key Arguments: The legislation would limit free speech and the ability to discuss and debate different ideas.
Personal experience with health information that was initially dismissed but later proven beneficial.
Belief that information labeled as conspiracy theories has been proven true over time.
Desire for government accountability and equal liability for misinformation.
Main Themes: Skepticism towards labeling information as misinformation
Notable Quotes: Without being able to debate, to talk, to discuss different ideas and situations we would be living in a communist state.
Over the past 3 years all the information that was being ridiculed as conspiracy theory has actually proven to be true.
I want to live in a free country, with free speech and have the ability to decide for myself what I believe.
